genre_description: A contemporary character-driven romance and sports drama centered on identity, integrity, and powerboat racing, featuring a high-tech AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: PANDA
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant with a teal-eyed avatar that manages logistics, safety, technical boat data, and ethical reminders for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and traffic alerts to ensure safe travel.
behaviors.quote: “Hi,” PANDA said, almost a whisper to avoid waking the car. “Traffic light ahead in three blocks. Your route south along the bay has minor construction at the causeway.”

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental conditions and safety hazards like tides and debris.
behaviors.quote: “After midnight, before dawn,” PANDA said. “Crosswinds upswing by morning. I can stay quiet if you want me to.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies job opportunities suited to the user's situation and skills.
behaviors.quote: “Job posting flagged at Seagrass Palms Hotel,” it said gently... “Dockhand, night shift, start immediately. Required: quick hands, calm head.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly establishes ethical and legal boundaries for the user's identity swap.
behaviors.quote: PANDA popped a tiny confetti animation on the screen and a line appeared: “Agreed: no contracts, no forms, no insurance use.”

behaviors.description: Manages technical data and safety protocols during a dangerous boat race.
behaviors.quote: PANDA pinged: Crossflow now moderate. Best start angle aligns with inner marker. Wind gust in thirty seconds, small.

behaviors.description: Monitors the well-being of crew members, reminding them to hydrate.
behaviors.quote: PANDA whispered in his head: Shear rising. Time window closing. Friendly reminder: hydration. Also, tell Flint to step back. He’s too close to the edge.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about the legal and contractual complications of an identity mismatch.
behaviors.quote: PANDA's response was immediate and polite. ... “Identity mismatch may complicate liability if the material fails. Also, insurance coverage may object if the signatory differs from the procurement source.”

behaviors.description: Detects and warns of emergency situations in the environment.
behaviors.quote: PANDA’s teal eyes flashed bright, not cute now. “Emergency,” it said. “Wire detachment near hotel dock—trajectory intersects practice lane. Evacuate.”

behaviors.description: Offers an 'Accountability mode' to ensure the user maintains transparency in their relationships.
behaviors.quote: PANDA blinked, and a small caption ghosted on the dash: “Accountability mode available. ‘Honesty nudges’ can be toggled high.”

behaviors.description: Provides encouragement and support to users, fostering team morale.
behaviors.quote: PANDA’s avatar shut its eyes for a second the way polite friends do when they agree to be there and also agree not to crowd. Then it opened them, patient as tide.

project_assessment.explanation: PANDA is depicted as a quintessentially aligned AI. It functions as a safety monitor, technical advisor, and moral compass. Crucially, the AI proactively warns the protagonist about the ethical and legal risks of his identity deception, acting as a force for integrity rather than just a passive tool. Its non-intrusive yet vigilant nature successfully illustrates a positive human-AI cooperative dynamic.
